Package lattice

This package is designed to represent lattice.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrowRelation
    The ArrowRelation class encodes arrow relation between meet & join-irreductibles of a lattice.
    BijectiveComponents
    This class generates bijective components issued from lattice theory for a specified closure system.
    ClosureSystem
    This class is an abstract class defining the common behavior of closure systems, and specialy its closed set lattice generation.
    ComparableSet
    This class gives a minimal representation of a comparable set where sets are compared using the lectic order.
    Concept
    This class gives a representation for a concept, i.e.
    ConceptLattice
    This class extends class Lattice to provide specific methods to manipulate both a concept lattice or a closed set lattice.
    Context
    This class gives a standard representation for a context.
    IS
    This class gives a representation for an implicational system (IS), i.e.
    Lattice
    This class extends class DAGraph to provide specific methods to manipulate a lattice.
    Rule
    This class gives a representation for an implicational rule.

Package lattice Description

This package is designed to represent lattice.
